column3: They got lot records from shows programs plus music from 1940’s to now even cassette tapes also posters CD HOLDERS which I just bought one for $40 that hold 240 CD’s
Found 2 books there I had been looking for about 2months. Very well stocked and will return when looking for another hard to find book or authors.
Business has closed. Another used book store is lost. 100 words too many for this review. Found a great store in Santa Fe, New Mexico.

I talked to some people on the street who told me this store moved some time ago. Imagine how I felt driving all the way there to find absolutely nothing. Guess they could have put that information here, eh?
In this day and age they continue to be a great old fashioned used book store. Large inventory with great variety of topics and very fair prices.

I love Half off Books starting with the name!!! They have new and slightly used books, but they also have collectable books and they can order any books that you don't find. I love walking in there with their hardwood floors and their very welcoming atmosphere. They also have fire sales where many books are only one dollar!!!

column2: Fantastic used bookstore on beautiful Greenleaf Avenue
column3: This is a wonderful used bookstore that book lovers can spend as much time as they need browsing around. For those already visiting Greenleaf Avenue, walking through Half Off after (or before) lunch or dinner makes for nice time. Inviting atmosphere and helpful staff. As their name implies, there are more than books here. Check their website for open mic events. A great complement to Greenleaf Ave.
